title: Homebase by Starlight
voice_description: Warm conversational female, calm and soothing
maya_text: On the rooftop loft, the vigilante warms a mug beneath the retro holo-lamp. It's a rare moment of quiet before the night.<sigh> She tunes her gentle gadgets, savoring the peace.

title: Neighborhood Neon
maya_text: The alley market is alive with laughter and the sweet aroma of stews. <sigh> But wait, I hear a child crying. There's a lost helper bot somewhere in these shadows. <curious>

title: Circuit Tea and Old Stories
voice_description: Warm, conversational female, middle-aged, gentle tone
maya_text: As the warm tea steams between us, I can’t help but smile. <excited> This little microdrone! It’s not just a gadget anymore; it’s like a friend. <chuckle> I used to dream of this kind of technology. <sigh> It feels like magic, really.

title: Rescue Under the Skybridge
maya_text: Look at me, little one. You're safe now. <soft> Just breathe. <sigh> I’ll get you out of here. <whisper> Those sentinels won't find us. <excited>

title: Nightcap on the Roof
voice_description: Warm conversational female, soft tone, calm pacing
maya_text: Under the soft glow of the lamp, I can see the little robot starting to come alive. <excited> It feels like a tiny miracle, doesn't it? <chuckle> I think I’ll keep you as my companion, shining bright beneath the stars. <sigh>
